meanings.sent1: The sandwich was breadless, so I had to eat it with just the filling.
meanings.sent2: She made a breadless pizza using cauliflower crust.
meanings.sent3: I felt a bit breadless at the bakery when I realized I forgot my wallet.
meanings.sent4: The breadless table looked lonely without any loaves or rolls.
meanings.sent5: The breadless picnic left everyone craving a slice of warm bread.

meanings.sent1: The breadless toast was a surprise at the breakfast table.
meanings.sent2: He followed a breadless diet to reduce his carb intake.
meanings.sent3: The breadless burger seemed incomplete without the bun.
meanings.sent4: The breadless pantry made her realize she needed to go grocery shopping.
meanings.sent5: The breadless party platter was a hit with the gluten-free guests.
